DOC.detailed_description: Aim : Primary objective : - To evaluate effect continue high dose clopidogrel treatment adverse cardiac event elective PCI patient clopidogrel resistance Secondary objective : - To evaluate effect continue high dose clopidogrel treatment adverse cardiac event elective PCI - To evaluate effect continue high dose clopidogrel treatment bleed complication elective PCI - To evaluate clinical effect VerifyNow use clopidogrel resistance kit . Study central : Bursa Postgraduate Hospital , Cardiology Clinic Study population : plan enrol 180 patient . 50 % patient without clopidogrel resistance ( control group : 90 patient ) 50 % clopidogrel resistance . Than randomise patient ( clopidogrel resistance ) two group ( group 1:45 patient ( 75mg/day ) , group 2:45 patient ( 150mg/day ) ) inclusion criterion : - The patient ; plan elective PCI write informed consent participation study . - Age > 18 year-old , - The native coronary artery ; lesion narrow > =70 % Exclusion criterion : - Patients allergy ASA , Clopidogrel heparin - Patients perform primary PCI - Patients acute coronary syndrome - Patients history PCI use clopidogrel - Patients warfarin therapy - Patients bleed diathesis , high risk bleeding . Study work : - Write case report form patient - Control inclusion criterion . - Evaluate clopidogrel ASA resistance VerifyNow kit . Than randomise patient . - Demographic data ( age , gender ) - Height , weight , BMI GFR - Risk factor - laboratory data ( biochemical hematologic ) - Medication history - Echocardiographic data - Angiographic data - PCI data ( vessel diameter , stent diameter , lesion stent length , perform PTCA , etc ) - Note complication ( MACE , bleeding , hematoma etc ) 4 week later note first control data assess clopidogrel resistance VerifyNow kit patient group 1 2 . Six month later note second control data .
